title: A Small Contribution A Big Impact (2025)

transcript.text: Coral reefs among the most biologically
diverse and ecologically important
ecosystems [music] on Earth. But they
are increasingly threatened by coral
bleaching triggered when corals expel
their symbiotic algae zusenthely [music]
due to heat stress and ocean
acidification.
Global sea surface temperatures have
risen by over 0.13° per decade since
1901 and may climb another 3 to 4° by
20100 [music] under high emission
scenarios. Bleaching has cascading
effects, disrupting food webs, reducing
biodiversity, and threatening the
livelihoods of over 5 million [music]
people globally. The main cause is
climate change driven by greenhouse gas
emissions with landbased pollution atom
pressure. Bleaching events are now more
[music] frequent and severe. As of April
2024, Noah confirmed the fourth global
mass bleaching event with 54% of the
world's reefs experiencing bleaching
level heat stress [music] slightly down
from the record of 56% affected during
the 2014 2017 event. Damaged coral reef
can be recovered through several method
including coral gardening,
transplantations and lava seeding. But
do you know that probiotic can help us
solve this problem? It [music] might
seem weird but let me explain. Coral
probiotic have been shown to induce
coral resistant to stress and diseases
which can help mitigate bleaching event
in the coral system. One study published
in 2019 show significant improvement in
coral bleaching when probiotic was
introduced. Without probiotic the
stressor could induce bleaching with two
[music] to three units decrease in coral
health chart. However, probiotic could
restore reef health with only one
replicate showing one unit reduction.
You might think that introducing
bacteria can be detrimental to the
surrounding environment. That was also
what I think. But another study in 2024
introduced probiotics into alcohol reef
in the Red Sea for 3 month. The
microorganism although reduce all the
bacterial colony in the coral did not
affect the health of the reef. [music]
In turn they increase the alpha
diversity of the system. So what are the
advantages of using coral probiotics?
Although some conventional methods such
as [music] coral gardening and
transplantation can recover and replace
damaged reefs, they do not address the
root cause of bleaching. While coral
probiotic can increase tolerant to
stress, [music] providing long-term
solution to the problem. In addition,
methods such as craft fertilization,
gardening and spawning induction require
large facility to accommodate the
requirement making the use of coral
probiotic less expensive. Furthermore,
the use of probiotic is more
environmental friendly as introduced
microorganism are parts of natural
microbiome of the coral. [music] This
finding can shape our understanding and
provide useful solution to recover our
coral reefs. Some of the world's most
iconic coral reefs, including our own
great barrier [music] reef, are on the
brink of collapse. Scientists warned
that if we [music] continue on our
current path, they could be extinct by
That's within our lifetime, within this
generation.
The clock is ticking, the oceans are
warming, and the reefs are waiting for
us to decide whether we will be the
generation that let them vanish or the
one that fought for their survival.
Let's not let the reef become [music] a
shell of what it was. Let's see the
change. Be the change before it all
slips beneath the surface.
Thanks for watching.
